trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [number of dots v] to [1] say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) * (2)) say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) * (2)) say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) * (2)) say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) * (2)) say (number of dots) for (1) secs
